message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good deal for my product.
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. Considering your offer, I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $140 and $130, so I'll offer you $135. This is my final compromise.
